dc_title_s: Plat book of Calhoun County Michigan
dc_description_s: Extent: 1 atlas (21 unnumbered pages) | Abstract: Atlas of township property maps showing names of rural landowners. | Notes: Publication date estimated by the existence of M-79 and M-78 and the omission of M-66 on county map.|Page 1 is a folded county map.|Scale determined from section lines. | Scale approximately 1:51,000
